item.title: Twitter bootstrap - modal not working in firefox
item.description: Quick heads up for those having issues getting the modal window in the twitter bootstrap to work in firefox, I had a problem where the overlay would show but not the actual modal window content. Seems there is a problem if you’re using animation (fade etc). See here for more information.
